Queries.users: CREATE TABLE users (user_id int PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, user_name varchar(20) NOT Null , user_email varchar(30) UNIQUE NOT NUll, user_password varchar(32) NOT Null, user_role SMALLINT NOT Null DEFAULT 0)
Queries.course_category: create table course_category(course_id int primary key AUTO_INCREMENT, course_name varchar(30) not null, course_description varchar(300))
